alert.note: Alert for Decatur; Gove; Graham; Logan; Norton; Rawlins; Sheridan; Thomas; Wichita (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 11 at 5:04PM CDT until April 12 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...Dangerous Fire Weather Conditions Through Thursday... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 002, 003, 004, 014, 015, 016, 028, 029, 042, 080, AND 081... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM TO 9 PM CDT WEDNESDAY FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 002, 003, 004, 014, 015, 016, 028, 029, 042, 080, AND 081... * Affected Area...In Kansas, Fire Weather Zone 002 Rawlins, Fire Weather Zone 003 Decatur, Fire Weather Zone 004 Norton, Fire Weather Zone 014 Thomas, Fire Weather Zone 015 Sheridan, Fire Weather Zone 016 Graham, Fire Weather Zone 028 Logan, Fire Weather Zone 029 Gove and Fire Weather Zone 042 Wichita. In Nebraska, Fire Weather Zone 080 Hitchcock and Fire Weather Zone 081 Red Willow. * Winds...South Southwest at 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 10 to 15 percent. * Temperatures...In the mid 80s. * Impacts...Extreme and unpredictable fire behavior. Any fires that start may rapidly grow and spread out of control.
info.instruction: Avoid outdoor burning. Repeating, outdoor burning is not advised today through Thursday. Any fires that start may rapidly grow and spread out of control.

area.areaDesc: Decatur; Gove; Graham; Logan; Norton; Rawlins; Sheridan; Thomas; Wichita
